title: LDWorkbenchConfiguration
description:
JSON Schema for LDWorkbench.
It helps with the writing of the configuration needed to run LDWorkbench pipelines.

name.description: The name of your pipeline. It must be unique over all your configurations.

description.description: An optional description for your pipeline.

baseDir.description: An optional base directory for files referenced by `file://...` paths.
baseDir.default: The directory that contains the YAML config file.

destination.description: The file where the final result of your pipeline is saved.

stages.description: A pipeline stage consists of an iterator and one or more generators.

name.description: The name of the stage. It must be unique within the pipeline.

query.description: SPARQL SELECT query that returns a `$this` binding for each URI that will be passed to the generator(s). Either an inline string (`SELECT $this WHERE {...}`) or a reference to a file (`file://...`) that contains the query.

endpoint.description: SPARQL endpoint for the iterator. If it starts with `file://`, a local RDF file is queried. If omitted the result of the previous stage is used.

batchSize.description: Number of `$this` bindings retrieved per query.
batchSize.default: The LIMIT value of your iterator query or 10 if no LIMIT is present.

delay.description: Human-readable time delay for requests to the the iteratorâ€™s SPARQL endpoint (e.g. `5ms`, `100 milliseconds`, `1s`).

query.description: SPARQL CONSTRUCT query that takes a `$this` binding from the iterator and generates triples for it. Either an inline string (`CONSTRUCT $this schema:name ?name WHERE {$this ...}`) or a reference to a file (`file://...`) that contains the query.

endpoint.description:
The SPARQL endpoint for the generator. 
If it starts with "file://", a local RDF file is queried.
If ommmitted the endpoint of the Iterator is used.

batchSize.description: Overrule the generator's behaviour of fetching results for 10 bindings of $this per request.

destination.description: The optional path where the results are saved. If omitted, a temporary file will be created.
